content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I. Love. Her.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Honestly, it's impossible to find a psychiatrist who isn't cold, reserved and clinical. Dr. Saifuddin is warm, friendly, smart, intuitive and comforting. Her office staff is amazing - kind, helpful and accommodating. I can't recommend her or her practice highly enough. Unfortunately with most great doctors - and they are a rare breed - I suspect she'll be unable to take new patients soon, but try if you need help - ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"she's a gem","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I have been going to this office since 2016 and still go to this day. Dr. Saifuddinâ€™s office does a great job in getting you in and out of your appointment in less than 20 mins or so every single time. They are very efficient in getting people in and out ASAP. My therapist, Nicole Montgomery, has been nothing short of spectacular and I trust her treatment plans 100%. She has ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"saved my life","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" through our therapy sessions and she cares a lot about her patients. Five stars all day!","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Everything about this practice is exemplary of comprehensive wellness. It radiates calm, gentle and kind. Dr. Saifuddin and her staff are all attentive and present to patients, one at a time, no rush. Whatever is needed for the individual.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Very consistent care for about 4 years. Even if they are super busy I never feel rushed to get out of the room.  The doctor, nurse practitioners, and therapists take a holistic approach, trying to get everyone healthy all around, not just psychologically.  Everyone is incredibly knowledgeable and experienced.  Admin staff have things down to an art and are accommodating.  I feel confident that they are not pushing medication when it isn't needed.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
